content: Welcome! In this lesson, we are going to teach you about the basics of programming. A 'program' is a set of instructions for a computer to follow. 'Syntax' is the set of rules, like grammar, that defines how to write those instructions. Python is a beginner friendly language known for its simple, readable syntax. Let's get started!
title: Welcome to Python
